title: Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, true to size, and well-made, with a flattering design that shows curves perfectly. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it's not too pink like Barbie. The length and see-through nature receive mixed reviews - while some find the length great, others say it's too short, and while some find it not see-through at all, others describe it as super see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Comfortable & Flattering!
items.body: The Wenrine Women’s Mesh Long Sleeve Square Neck Top is such a great piece! The mesh material is soft, breathable, and feels comfortable all day. I love the square neckline — it’s flattering and adds a touch of elegance to any outfit. The fit is true to size, and it pairs well with both casual and dressy looks. Whether dressed up or down, it looks chic and stylish. Definitely a versatile wardrobe staple that’s worth adding to your closet! Read more
items.author: Labellemadelyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable going out dress!
items.body: Comfortable and good quality dress! They’re my go material isn’t see through and the sizing is very forgiving. I wore this 6 months pregnant and felt really cute! Read more
items.author: Nic

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cute, but white is see through.
items.body: The shape of the dress is very flattering and comfortable! True to size. The fabric is soft and stretchy. However, the white is very see through, unfortunately will be returning. Read more
items.author: Mackenzie Blomquist

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Halloween Alterations
items.body: Loved it, fits well! Great quality for the money. I altered it for Halloween and used it for a costume. It looked fantastic on me. I did alter it but would wear the dress to a party. Read more
items.author: Love it

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress for a night out on the town!
items.body: Great value! Cute dress, received a ton of compliments for a dinner out with the girls. Went with the small. I’m 5’6, 125lbs and curvy figure. It came about mid/upper thigh on me so a tad shorter than I normally wear. The ruched look did a nice job of covering problem areas. I purchased the light khaki and it was not see-through, but I did wear nude undergarments. Has some stretch to it and the fabric is decent quality. Arms are sheer which was nice for fall. Considering purchasing one in black. Read more
items.author: Danielle Martin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just Ok.
items.body: Ok, let me just say that I was very worried when we received this in the mail. The color was NOT the same as the picture. It was actually a light blue. Fabric was also a little cheap feeling. However, it looked cute on, so my daughter kept it. She made it 15 minutes at the dance, and I got a message saying the elastic around her wrist had snapped. So, she ended up just snapping the other side, to make it look less awkward. Read more
items.author: Jenny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Top
items.body: This top is sooo soft! It's like a shirt/sweater hybrid... The torso part is almost suede like. Idk what I was expecting but im not that, lol... Anyway the pic doesn't do it justice. Such a great top and decent color, quality and fit. Will but from them again. Read more
items.author: Samantha DeFranco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: I love this dress it is so stretchy and super comfy the size fit on the first try which Tarly happens when I shop online it is amazing quality and over I love it so much and wore so many times! Read more
items.author: Lauren

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Light Blue, Olive, Red, Rose Red, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
